ygData.subject: Recurrent architecture in NEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, i would like to ask , which recurrent architecture is implemented in NEAT? Is it an Elman network type? Or maybe Hopfield network? I have looked at rtNeat

Hi,
i would like to ask , which recurrent architecture is implemented in NE=
AT? Is it an Elman network type? Or maybe Hopfield network? I have looked a=
t rtNeat code but still can't understand how recurrency is done, how many t=
imes does it propagate in a loop, what is the loop exit condition, etc... ?=
 

Thanks in advance
Nikolai
